evidence.claim: Nomo Smart Care utilizes AWS for cloud services.
The platform supports FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Nomo Smart Care has implemented HIPAA compliance measures as part of its security protocols.
The system integrates with EHRs using HL7 protocols for data interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or EDI use cases found on their site.
